alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 6:30PM CDT until May 10 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Southeastern Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas... Northwestern Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Southwestern Decatur County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rexford, or 15 miles west of Hoxie, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 625 PM CDT, pea to quarter sized hail was reported over Menlo. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rexford around 635 PM CDT. Selden around 650 PM CDT. Oberlin around 730 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Kanona. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Kansas.
